            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Unit trusts, bonds, structured products (including equity-linked investments, structured notes, Deposit Plus, structured investment deposits and capital-protected investment deposits) are investment products. Together with certificates of deposit (CDs), they are NOT equivalent to time deposits. Some unit trusts and structured products may involve derivatives. The investment decision is yours but you should not invest unless the intermediary who sells it to you has explained to you that the product is suitable for you having regard to your financial situation, investment experience and investment objectives.</li> 
 <li>The price of products may move up or down and may become valueless. Losses may be incurred as well as profits made as a result of buying and selling the products.</li> 
 <li>In the worst case scenario, the value of the products may be worth substantially less than the original amount you invested (and in an extreme case could be worth nothing).</li> 
 <li>Issuer’s Risk – Bonds, CDs and structured products are subject to both the actual and perceived measures of credit worthiness of the issuer. There is no assurance of protection against a default by the issuer in respect of the repayment obligations. In the worst case scenario, you might not be able to recover the principal and interest/coupon if the issuer defaults on the bonds, CDs and structured products.</li> 
 <li>Investors should not make investment decisions based on this material alone.</li> 
 <li>Investment involves risks. Past performance of the products is no guide to future performance. For details of the products, the related fees and charges and risk factors, please refer to the individual product materials and/or offering materials.</li> 
 <li>Currency conversion risk – the value of your foreign currency and RMB products will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. If you choose to convert your foreign currency and RMB payments to other currencies at an exchange rate that is less favourable than that exchange rate in which you made your original conversion to foreign currency and RMB, you may suffer loss in principal/investment.</li> 
 <li>RMB-denominated products are subject to liquidity risk as there may be no regular trading and active secondary market for RMB income instruments. The bid and offer spread of the price of RMB income instruments may be large, so investors may incur significant trading and realisation costs, and may suffer losses accordingly.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Structured investment deposits, Deposit Plus, capital-protected investment deposits and CDs are not protected deposits and are not protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong. Deposit Plus and Certificates of Deposit is NOT principal-protected.</p>
</div></div>

<h2 class="heading A-TYP28L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_main_heading_1">
    What is ESG?
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_2" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>ESG (Environment, Social and Governance) products let you shape the future while growing your wealth. You can measure the sustainability of your investment with non-financial factors. Environment focuses on the conservation of nature, Social focuses on how an organisation treats people, while Governance considers how a company is run.</p>
<p> <br>
Investing in ESG products has made the jump from niche to mainstream in recent years, and it's here to stay as a reference standard.</p>
 <p></p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_5" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Evidence shows that companies with better Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) credentials may be more likely to show better financial performance<sup><a href="#fn-esg1" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 1</span></a></sup>. </p>

</h2>

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_16">

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="pp_main_accordion_3" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="additional-requirements-1"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1848447110__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1848447110__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is ESG and sustainable investing? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1848447110__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_17">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_29" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_14" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG stands for Environmental, Social and Governance. ESG and sustainability factors influence a wide range of industries from agricultural, industrial, consumption, technology to medical sectors as these factors are closely connected to social policies, economic development and individual lives.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_6" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="additional-requirements-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1651524722__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1651524722__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why does ESG and sustainable investing matter?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1651524722__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_18">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_30" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_15" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG and sustainable investing provides a measure for investors to use to seek and screen the sustainability of investment opportunities arising from the global response to climate change.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As ESG and sustainable investing is gaining traction, it's likely to become an important factor for corporate performance, driven by market demand. Investment portfolios may become more resilient and contribute to society as a whole through the inclusion of ESG and sustainable investing. Investors should also note that ESG and sustainable investing solutions do not guarantee returns on their portfolios.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_7" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-195916429__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-195916429__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Do ESG and sustainable investing provide or guarantee better performance?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-195916429__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_19">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_31" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_16" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG and sustainable investing maintains a focus on financial returns, alongside environmental and social considerations. Based on our analysis, adopting an ESG and sustainable investing approach in investment has benefited stock and bond portfolio performance over the last 10 years. Plus, risk-adjusted returns in the long-term are likely to be structurally stronger as the economy transitions to sustainability.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">However, ESG and sustainable investing do not guarantee or necessarily provide better performance than their peers. ESG and sustainable investing factors don't necessarily hurt investment performance, and sustainable investment may in fact help future-proof investment portfolios against the risks associated with a transition to a more sustainable economy.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note past performance is not indicative of future performance.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_8" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1153780920__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1153780920__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What products are under the ESG and sustainable investing umbrella?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1153780920__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_20">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_32" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_17" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We offer a comprehensive range of ESG and sustainable investing products that help align your sustainability objectives with your financial goals. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1789929812__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1789929812__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I find ESG and sustainable investing funds? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1789929812__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_21">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_33" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_18" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can access our list of ESG and sustainable investing funds using the ESG search checkbox when you search for unit trusts in HSBC Online Banking or on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_10" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="435549008__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="435549008__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How will investment products be assessed as 'ESG and sustainable investing' products at HSBC? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="435549008__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_22">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_34" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_19" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">At HSBC, we classify ESG and sustainable investing as either ESG Enhanced, Thematic and Impact.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG Enhanced: Investment products that follow specific ESG criteria.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Thematic: Investment products that focus on ESG related growth areas by identifying companies aligned to specific sustainable themes.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Impact: Investment products that aim to have a direct, positive impact on society, environment or both. There are clearly pre-defined measurable impact targets and are subject to periodic impact reporting.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_11" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1366549837__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-1366549837__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I hold a similar product at another institution but its ESG and sustainable investing classification is different than that of HSBC. Why is it the case?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1366549837__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_23">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_35" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_20" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Different organisations may employ various methodologies for classifying ESG and sustainable investing products. HSBC adopts a strict product assessment and classifies products according to the framework established (ESG Enhanced, Thematic and Impact) to define what we consider to be ‘ESG and sustainable investing'.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG and sustainable investing is an evolving area and new regulations may come into effect which may affect how an investment is categorised or labelled. An investment which is considered to fulfil ESG and sustainable investing criteria today may not meet those criteria at some point in the future. We will review and update the eligible investment product list from time to time.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div id="pp_rel_columnControl_2">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_rel_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The information is not and should not be construed as an offer to buy or sell any investment products, and should not be considered as investment advice. You should carefully consider whether any investment products are appropriate in view of your investment experience, objectives, financial resources and relevant circumstances.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment involves risk. Investors should not only base on this material alone to make investment decisions. Please refer to the offering documents of the respective funds for details, including product features, fees and charges, and risk factors. The price of units or shares and the income from them may go down as well as up and any past performance figures shown are not indicative of future performance. The information contained on this website is intended for Hong Kong residents only and should not be construed as a distribution, an offer to sell, or a solicitation to buy any securities in any jurisdiction where such activities would be unlawful under the laws of such jurisdiction, in particular the United States of America. Please refer to the <a href="/investments/products/mutual-funds/disclaimer/" target="_self">unit trust disclaimer</a> for further important details.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The Securities and Futures Commission (the 'SFC') has authorised the Equity Linked Investments and offering documents of Equity Linked Investments. The SFC's authorisation does not imply official recommendation or endorsement of equity-linked investments, nor does it guarantee the commercial merits of equity-linked investments or its performance.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The contents of this page have not been reviewed by the Securities and Futures Commission.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Issued by the Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>ESG and sustainable investing risk disclosure </strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">In broad terms “ESG and sustainable investing” products include investment approaches or instruments which consider environmental, social, governance and/or other sustainability factors to varying degrees. Certain instruments HSBC (“we”) classify as sustainable may be in the process of changing to deliver sustainability outcomes. There is no guarantee that ESG and Sustainable investing products will produce returns similar to those which don’t consider these factors. ESG and Sustainable investing products may diverge from traditional market benchmarks. In addition, there is no standard definition of, or measurement criteria for, ESG and Sustainable investing or the impact of ESG and Sustainable investing products. ESG and Sustainable investing and related impact measurement criteria are (a) highly subjective and (b) may vary significantly across and within sectors.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">HSBC may rely on measurement criteria devised and reported by third party providers or issuers. HSBC does not always conduct its own specific due diligence in relation to measurement criteria. There is no guarantee: (a) that the nature of the ESG / sustainability impact or measurement criteria of an investment will be aligned with any particular investor’s sustainability goals; or (b) that the stated level or target level of ESG / sustainability impact will be achieved. ESG and Sustainable investing is an evolving area and new regulations are being developed which will affect how investments can be categorised or labelled. An investment which is considered to fulfil sustainable criteria today may not meet those criteria at some point in the future.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">When we classify an investment product or service against our ESG and Sustainable Investing (SI) categories described in this document: ESG Enhanced, Thematic or Impact, this does not mean that all individual underlying holdings in the investment product or portfolio will meet the relevant SI criteria. As such, an SI classification does not mean that all underlying holdings in a fund or discretionary portfolio meet the relevant sustainable investment criteria. Similarly, where an equity or fixed income investment is classified under an ESG Enhanced, Thematic or Impact category this does not mean that the underlying issuer’s activities are fully sustainable. Not all investments, portfolios or services are classifiable under our SI categories. This may be because there is insufficient information available or because a particular investment product does not meet HSBC’s SI classifications criteria.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk disclosure – Bonds and certificates of deposit ("CDs")</strong><br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">There are risks involved in buying bonds / CDs. Before applying for any of bonds / CDs, you should consider whether bonds / CDs is suitable for you in light of your own financial circumstances and objectives. If you are in any doubt, get independent professional advice.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Bonds / CDs are mainly medium to long term fixed income products, not for short term speculation. You should be prepared to hold your funds in bonds / CDs for the full tenor; you could lose part or all of your principal if you choose to sell your bonds / CDs prior to maturity.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">It is the issuer to pay interest and repay principal of bonds / CDs. If the issuer defaults, the holder of bonds / CDs may not be able to receive back the interest and principal. The holder of bonds / CDs bears the credit risk of the issuer and has no recourse to HSBC unless HSBC is the issuer itself.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Indicative price of bonds / CDs are available and the bonds / CDs' prices do fluctuate when market changes. Factors affecting market price of bonds / CDs include, and are not limited to, fluctuations in interest rates, credit spreads, and liquidity premiums. The fluctuation in yield generally has a greater effect on prices of longer tenor bonds / CDs. There is an inherent risk that losses may be incurred rather than profit made as a result of buying and selling bonds / CDs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">If you wish to sell bonds / CDs, HSBC may repurchase them based on the prevailing market price under normal market circumstances, but the selling price may differ from the original buying price due to changes in market conditions.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">There may be exchange rate risks if you choose to convert payments made on the bond/CDs to your home currency.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The secondary market for bonds / CDs may not provide significant liquidity or may trade at prices based on the prevailing market conditions and may not be in line with the expectations of bonds / CDs' holders.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">If bonds / CDs are early redeemed, you may not be able to enjoy the same rates of return when you use the funds to purchase other products.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Do not purchase the bonds / CDs unless you fully understand and are willing to assume the risks associated with it.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>High yield bonds risk disclosure</strong><br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">High yield bonds are typically rated below investment grade by a credit rating agency, or unrated. Whilst high yield bonds bear a higher yield opportunity than investment grade bonds, they present greater risks of issuer default, liquidity, volatility and non-payment of principal and interest.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The risk of default on principal and / or interest, is greater for high yield bonds due to higher credit risk of the issuer and lower priority of claim by the bond holders in case of issuer default.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">High yield bonds can sometimes be less liquid than investment-grade bonds, depending on the issuer and the market conditions at any given time. Investors may be difficult to sell the high yield bond before maturity or at prices in line with their expectation compare to listed bond.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">High yield bonds tend to be more vulnerable to economic cycles and changes in the issuer's financial conditions or business developments. In particular, during economic downturn, such bonds typically fall more in value than investment-grade bonds as the issuer default risk rises and investors become more risk adverse.<br> </span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Please be aware the concentration risk of investing in bonds issued by the same issuer or companies by the same group. A degrading of any of the group company's credit rating may expose the whole group to contagion risk. Please be also aware the risk of over concentrating investment in the high risk investment products.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk disclosure – structured products</strong><br> <br> <strong>Equity-linked investments ("ELIs") risk dislosure</strong><br></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The following risks should be read together with the other risks contained in the "Risk Warnings" section in the relevant offering documents of the ELIs.<br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You should note that the information contained in this material does NOT form part of the offering documents of our ELIs. You should read all the offering documents of our ELIs (including the programme memorandum, the financial disclosure document, the relevant product booklet and the indicative term sheet and any addendum to any of such documents) before deciding whether to invest in our ELIs. If you have doubts on the content of this material, you should seek independent professional advice.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">This is a structured and complex product involving derivatives.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not a time deposit – ELI is NOT equivalent to, nor should it be treated as a substitute for, time deposit. It is NOT a protected deposit and is NOT protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not principal-protected – ELIs are not principal-protected: you could lose all of your investment.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Limited potential gain – you may not receive any potential cash dividend amount. The maximum potential gain under this product is capped at an amount equal to the sum of the difference between the issue price and the nominal amount of the ELIs (if any) (less any cash settlement expenses) and the maximum periodic potential cash dividend amount(s) payable during the scheduled tenor (ie the period from (and including) the issue date to (and including) the settlement date) of the ELIs. It is possible that you may not receive any potential cash dividend amount for the entire scheduled tenor of the ELIs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Re-investment risk – If our ELIs are terminated early, we will pay you the nominal amount of the ELIs (less any cash settlement expenses) and any accrued potential cash dividend amount calculated up to (and including) that call date. No further potential cash dividend amount will be payable following such early termination. Market conditions may have changed and you may not be able to enjoy the same rate of return if you re-invest these proceeds in other investments with similar risk parameters.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">No collateral – ELIs are not secured on any of our assets or any collateral.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Limited market making arrangements are available and you may suffer a loss if you sell your ELIs before expiry – Our ELIs are designed to be held to their settlement date. Limited market making arrangements are available on a bi-weekly basis for all our ELIs. If you try to sell your ELIs before expiry, the amount you receive for each ELI may be substantially less than the issue price you paid for each ELI.<br> </span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not the same as investing in the reference asset – Investing in our ELIs is not the same as investing in the reference asset. Changes in the market price of the reference asset may not lead to a corresponding change in the market value of, or your potential payout under, the ELIs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not covered by Investor Compensation Fund – Our ELIs are not listed on any stock exchange and are not covered by the Investor Compensation Fund. There may not be any active or liquid secondary market.<br> </span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Maximum loss upon HSBC's default or insolvency – Our ELIs constitute general, unsecured and unsubordinated contractual obligations of HSBC as issuer and of no other person (including the ultimate holding company of our group, HSBC Holdings plc). When you buy our ELIs, you will be relying on HSBC's creditworthiness. If HSBC becomes insolvent or defaults on its obligations under the ELIs, in the worst case scenario, you could lose all of your investment.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risks relating to RMB – You should note that the value of RMB against other foreign currencies fluctuates and will be affected by, amongst other things, the PRC government's control (for example, the PRC government regulates conversion between RMB and foreign currencies), which may adversely affect your return under this product when you convert RMB into your home currency. The value of your RMB-denominated ELIs will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. If you choose to convert your RMB deposit to other currencies at an exchange rate that is less favourable than that in which you made your original conversion to RMB, you may suffer loss in principal. This product (if denominated in RMB) will be denominated and settled in RMB deliverable in Hong Kong, which is different from that of RMB deliverable in mainland China.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You may, at settlement, receive physical delivery of reference asset(s).</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Our ELIs may be terminated early by us according to the terms as set out in offering documents of our ELIs.<br> </span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Our ELIs are structured investment products which are embedded with derivatives.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment returns (if any) not denominated in home currency are exposed to exchange rate fluctuations. Rates of exchange may cause the value of investments to go up or down.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited is the issuer and product arranger of our ELIs.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Renminbi ('RMB') related products risk disclosure</strong><br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">There may be exchange rate risks if you choose to convert RMB payments made on the bonds / CDs to your home currency.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">RMB debt instruments are subject to interest rate fluctuations, which may adversely affect the return and performance of the RMB products.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">RMB products may suffer significant losses in liquidating the underlying investments if such investments do not have an active secondary market and their prices have large bid/ offer spreads.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You could lose part or all of your principal if you choose to sell your RMB bonds / CDs prior to maturity.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Private placement notes (PPNs) risk disclosure</strong><br></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The following risks should be read together with the other risks contained in the "Risk Factors" section in the relevant offering documents of the PPNs.<br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You should note that the information contained in this website does NOT form part of the offering documents of our PPNs. You should read all the offering documents of our PPNs (including the offering memorandum, and the indicative term sheet) before deciding whether to invest in our PPNs. If you have doubt on the content of this website, you should seek independent professional advice.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not a time deposit – PPNs are NOT equivalent to, nor should it be treated as a substitute for, time deposits. It is NOT a protected deposit and is NOT protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not principal-protected – some PPNs are not principal-protected: you could lose all of your investment.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment return risk – It is possible that you may not receive any potential cash dividend amount for the entire scheduled tenor of the PPNs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Re-investment risk – If our PPNs are early terminated, we will pay you the nominal amount of the PPNs (less any cash settlement expenses) and any accrued potential cash dividend amount calculated up to (and including) that call date. No further potential cash dividend amount will be payable following such early termination. Market conditions may have changed and you may not be able to enjoy the same rate of return if you re-invest these proceeds in other investments with similar risk parameters.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">No collateral – PPNs are not secured on any of our assets or any collateral.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Limited market making arrangements are available and you may suffer a loss if you sell your PPNs before expiry. Our PPNs are designed to be held to their settlement date. Limited market making arrangements are available on a bi-weekly basis for all our PPNs. If you try to sell your PPNs before expiry, the amount you receive for each PPN may be substantially less than the issue price you paid for each PPN.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not the same as investing in the reference asset – Investing in our PPNs is not the same as investing in the reference asset. Changes in the market price of the reference asset may not lead to a corresponding change in the market value of, or your potential payout under, the PPNs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not covered by Investor Compensation Fund – Our PPNs are not listed on any stock exchange and are not covered by the Investor Compensation Fund. There may not be any active or liquid secondary market.<br> </span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Maximum loss upon HSBC's default or insolvency – Our PPNs constitute general, unsecured and unsubordinated contractual obligations of HSBC as issuer and of no other person (including the ultimate holding company of our group, HSBC Holdings plc). When you buy our PPNs, you will be relying on HSBC's creditworthiness. If HSBC becomes insolvent or defaults on its obligations under the PPNs, in the worst case scenario, you could lose all of your investment.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risks relating to RMB – You should note that the value of RMB against other foreign currencies fluctuates and will be affected by, amongst other things, the PRC government's control (for example, the PRC government regulates conversion between RMB and foreign currencies), which may adversely affect your return under this product when you convert RMB into your home currency. The value of your RMB-denominated PPNs will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. If you choose to convert your RMB deposit to other currencies at an exchange rate that is less favourable than that in which you made your original conversion to RMB, you may suffer loss in principal. This product (if denominated in RMB) will be denominated and settled in RMB deliverable in Hong Kong, which is different from that of RMB deliverable in mainland China.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You may, at settlement, receive physical delivery of reference asset(s).</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Our PPNs may be terminated early by us according to the terms as set out in offering documents of our PPNs.<br> </span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Our PPNs are structured investment products which are embedded with derivatives.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment returns (if any) not denominated in home currency are exposed to exchange rate fluctuations. Rates of exchange may cause the value of investments to go up or down.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited is the issuer and product arranger of our ELIs.<br></p>

<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The information contained in this material and the content have not been reviewed by the Securities and Futures Commission of Hong Kong or any regulatory authority in Hong Kong.<br></p>
